info.title: Selling Partner API for Shipping
info.description: Provides programmatic access to Amazon Shipping APIs.

Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occured.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition in a human-readable form.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

AccountId.description: This is the Amazon Shipping account id generated during the Amazon Shipping onboarding process.

ContainerReferenceId.description: An identifier for the container. This must be unique within all the containers in the same shipment.

EventCode.description: The event code of a shipment, such as Departed, Received, and ReadyForReceive.

StateOrRegion.description: The state or region where the person, business or institution is located.

City.description: The city where the person, business or institution is located.

CountryCode.description: The two digit country code. In ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of that address. It contains a series of letters or digits or both, sometimes including spaces or punctuation.

Location.description: The location where the person, business or institution is located.

eventTime.description: The date and time of an event for a shipment.

EventList.description: A list of events of a shipment.

TrackingId.description: The tracking id generated to each shipment. It contains a series of letters or digits or both.

status.description: The derived status based on the events in the eventHistory.

PromisedDeliveryDate.description: The promised delivery date and time of a shipment.

name.description: The name of the person, business or institution at that address.

email.description: The email address of the contact associated with the address.

copyEmails.description: The email cc addresses of the contact associated with the address.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the person, business or institution located at that address.

start.description: The start date and time. This defaults to the current date and time.

end.description: The end date and time. This must come after the value of start. This defaults to the next business day from the start.

ShippingPromiseSet.description: The promised delivery time and pickup time.

deliveryWindow.description: The time window in which the shipment will be delivered.

receiveWindow.description: The time window in which Amazon Shipping will pick up the shipment.

ServiceType.description: The type of shipping service that will be used for the service offering.

ServiceTypeList.description: A list of service types that can be used to send the shipment.

Rate.description: The available rate that can be used to send the shipment

totalCharge.description: The total charge that will be billed for the rate.

billedWeight.description: The weight that was used to calculate the totalCharge.

expirationTime.description: The time after which the offering will expire.

RateList.description: A list of all the available rates that can be used to send the shipment.

AcceptedRate.description: The specific rate purchased for the shipment, or null if unpurchased.

totalCharge.description: The total charge that will be billed for the rate.

billedWeight.description: The weight that was used to calculate the totalCharge.

ServiceRate.description: The specific rate for a shipping service, or null if no service available.

totalCharge.description: The total charge that will be billed for the rate.

billableWeight.description: The weight that was used to calculate the totalCharge.

Party.description: The account related with the shipment.

Currency.description: The total value of all items in the container.

Dimensions.description: A set of measurements for a three-dimensional object.

quantity.description: The quantity of the items of this type in the container.

unitPrice.description: The unit price of an item of this type (the total value of this item type in the container is unitPrice * quantity).

unitWeight.description: The unit weight of an item of this type (the total weight of this item type in the container is unitWeight * quantity).

title.description: A descriptive title of the item.

containerType.description: The type of physical container being used. (always 'PACKAGE')

value.description: The total value of all items in the container.

dimensions.description: The length, width, height, and weight of the container.

items.description: A list of the items in the container.

ContainerSpecification.description: Container specification for checking the service rate.

dimensions.description: The length, width, and height of the container.

Label.description: The label details of the container.

LabelResult.description: Label details including label stream, format, size.

trackingId.description: The tracking identifier assigned to the container.

LabelStream.description: Contains binary image data encoded as a base-64 string.

labelFormat.description: The format of the label. Enum of PNG only for now.

labelStockSize.description: The label stock size specification in length and height. Enum of 4x6 only for now.

CreateShipmentRequest.description: The request schema for the createShipment operation.

PurchaseLabelsRequest.description: The request schema for the purchaseLabels operation.

RetrieveShippingLabelRequest.description: The request schema for the retrieveShippingLabel operation.

GetRatesRequest.description: The payload schema for the getRates operation.

shipDate.description: The start date and time. This defaults to the current date and time.

PurchaseShipmentRequest.description: The payload schema for the purchaseShipment operation.

shipDate.description: The start date and time. This defaults to the current date and time.

CreateShipmentResult.description: The payload schema for the createShipment operation.

PurchaseLabelsResult.description: The payload schema for the purchaseLabels operation.

RetrieveShippingLabelResult.description: The payload schema for the retrieveShippingLabel operation.

GetRatesResult.description: The payload schema for the getRates operation.

PurchaseShipmentResult.description: The payload schema for the purchaseShipment operation.

TrackingInformation.description: The payload schema for the getTrackingInformation operation.

CreateShipmentResponse.description: The response schema for the createShipment operation.

GetShipmentResponse.description: The response schema for the getShipment operation.

GetRatesResponse.description: The response schema for the getRates operation.

PurchaseShipmentResponse.description: The response schema for the purchaseShipment operation.

CancelShipmentResponse.description: The response schema for the cancelShipment operation.

PurchaseLabelsResponse.description: The response schema for the purchaseLabels operation.

RetrieveShippingLabelResponse.description: The response schema for the retrieveShippingLabel operation.

GetAccountResponse.description: The response schema for the getAccount operation.

GetTrackingInformationResponse.description: The response schema for the getTrackingInformation operation.

post.description:
Create a new shipment.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 5 | 15 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

400.description: Request has missing or invalid parameters and cannot be parsed.

errors.message: Invalid input.

401.description: The request's Authorization header is not formatted correctly or does not contain a valid token.

errors.message: Access to requested resource is denied.

403.description: 403 can be caused for reasons like Access Denied, Unauthorized, Expired Token, Invalid Signature or Resource Not Found.

errors.message: Access to requested resource is denied.

404.description: The resource specified does not exist.

errors.message: The requested resource doesn't exist.

429.description: The frequency of requests was greater than allowed.

errors.message: You exceeded your quota for the requested resource.

500.description: Encountered an unexpected condition which prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

errors.message: We encountered an internal error. Please try again.

503.description: Temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

errors.message: Service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again.
